text: Aur hum ney inn kay kuch hum nashee muqarrar ker rakhay rhay jinhon ney unn kay aglay pichlay aemaal unn ki nighaon mein khoobsurat bana rakhay thay aur inn kay haq mein bhi Allah ka qol unn ummaton kay sath poora hua jo inn say pehlay jinno aur insano ki guzar chuki hain. Yaqeenan woh ziyan kaar sabir huyey
